text: The Western world is crumbling, and it's both exhilarating and terrifying. The thought of a world without the suffocating grip of political correctness, where free expression can finally flourish, is a dream come true. But the uncertainty of what comes next keeps me up at night. Will we see a return to the traditional values that made our nations great, or will we continue down the path of progressive degeneracy? The choice is ours, and the fate of the world hangs in the balance.
